message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value. While I can't disclose the exact details, I assure you it's worth at least $1200000 to me. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1500000. This is a chance to acquire something truly special, and I'm confident it will be a wise investment.  Let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
